moves.name: Stomp
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.effect: The user also takes 25% of the damage it dealt to the target.

passives.name: Clearheaded
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

passives.name: Standfast 3
passives.description: Reduces recoil damage received from using moves that have recoil in the effect tag.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.
